            <string language="en">Parts of a Greek theatre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teile eines griechischen Theaters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parties d'un théâtre grec</string>

          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Recurso interactivo que permite reconocer las principales partes de un teatro griego.</string>
